AtomNode.trailing: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

CommandModuledocNode.comment:
### take and drop
Further results on `List.take` and `List.drop`, which rely on stronger automation in `Nat`, are given in `Init.Data.List.TakeDrop`. -/

AtomNode.val:
### take and drop
Further results on `List.take` and `List.drop`, which rely on stronger automation in `Nat`, are given in `Init.Data.List.TakeDrop`. -/

Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

### take and drop
Further results on `List.take` and `List.drop`, which rely on stronger automation in `Nat`, are given in `Init.Data.List.TakeDrop`. -/
-- Arguments are explicit so we can rewrite from right to left.

-- The argument `p` is explicit, as otherwise the head of the left hand side may be a metavariable.
